content:
I develop and design software.
======

I'm a Chicago based web engineer who's been designing, developing and building since 1995.

I do all sorts of stuff but I'm primarily focused on building applications for the web in Ruby and JavaScript.

I've managed teams between five and twenty five and practice agile methodologies.
name: Developer/Engineer
Beer
content:
I make and drink a lot of beer.
============

I've been home brewing for about twenty years now, but that really just stems for a passion for beer.

I love talking about it almost as much as I like drinking it.

name: charcuterie
content:
I love homemade charcuterie
==================

From a simple duck prosciutto to a sausage or terrine, I love creating my own meat products.

Smoking, curing, fermenting you name I'm into it.

name: cheese
content:
Although I'm a novice, I'm very excited about the world of cheese making.

I've done some simple cheeses and I'm looking forward into getting into more complex stuff like cheddering.

Did I mention I actually like javascript?
==========
I'm one of those guys who loves JavaScript. Backbone on the front end, Node on the back end and everything in between.

Here are some recent JS projects:
--------

* [funbrella](http://github.com/danboy/funbrella)
* [this site](http://dannawara.com)
name: Javascript
Ruby
content:
Ruby, Rails, Sinatra and all those other buzzwords.
===============================

While not an expert, my ruby experience is extensive having been working with it professionally for nine years now. Projects of every scale you can Imagine, but you probably care most that I worked on large scale apps such as [Groupon](http://www.groupon.com) and [Sears "Manage My Home"](http://managemylife.com).
